comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text: signtool calls CERT_VerifyCert and CERT_VerifyCertNow. We should add an option to use libpkix's CERT_PKIXVerifyCert and/or make libpkix the default.
comments.raw_text: signtool calls CERT_VerifyCert and CERT_VerifyCertNow. We should add an option to use libpkix's CERT_PKIXVerifyCert and/or make libpkix the default.
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
